content: modern and simplistic this free raglan crochet pattern is the perfect autumn wardrobe staple designed with style and functionality in mind this cozy sweater can be dressed up for events or dressed down for a cozy autumnal fit because of the raglan construction this sweater is completely seamless making for an enjoyable process first time making a top-down sweater no worries the pattern includes lots of photos to help you along the way ad free pdf https //www etsy com/listing/1324390019/crochet-pattern-modern-crochet-raglan
